title: Don’t sleep on this FANTASTIC DEAL for the OnePlus Open and save $400!
description: The OnePlus Open is on sale on Amazon right now where this deal shaves 24% off its price, making it a fantastic option. The post Don’t sleep on this FANTASTIC DEAL for the OnePlus Open and save $400! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Tyler Lee
excerpt: The OnePlus Open is on sale on Amazon right now where this deal shaves 24% off its price, making it a fantastic option.
text: OnePlus really surprised us when they launched the OnePlus Open. We thought it’d be just another foldable phone, but the display aspect ratio, the cameras, and the software turned it into one of our favorite foldables. If you’re keen, then you might be pleased to learn that it is on sale where an Amazon deal is shaving 24% off the price of the OnePlus Open. The OnePlus Open is normally priced at $1,700. That’s a lot to pay for a smartphone, but with this 24% discount, it brings it down to a slightly more manageable $1,300. We know that it’s still not cheap, not by a long shot, but considering the price of other foldables, it’s a great deal. Buy On Amazon The OnePlus Open features an internal foldable display measuring 7.82-inches with a 120Hz refresh rate. The phone also packs a triple camera setup developed with Hasselblad, and like we said earlier, takes fantastic photos. It is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, which in 2024 is still extremely viable, and comes with 16GB of RAM and a 4,805mAh battery. All in all, at $1,300 if you want a foldable smartphone, then this OnePlus Open deal is for you. You can check it out by clicking on this link and heading to Amazon to grab it today. html:
OnePlus really surprised us when they launched the OnePlus Open. We thought it’d be just another foldable phone, but the display aspect ratio, the cameras, and the software turned it into one of our favorite foldables. If you’re keen, then you might be pleased to learn that it is on sale where an Amazon deal is shaving 24% off the price of the OnePlus Open.

The OnePlus Open is normally priced at $1,700. That’s a lot to pay for a smartphone, but with this 24% discount, it brings it down to a slightly more manageable $1,300. We know that it’s still not cheap, not by a long shot, but considering the price of other foldables, it’s a great deal.

Buy On Amazon

The OnePlus Open features an internal foldable display measuring 7.82-inches with a 120Hz refresh rate. The phone also packs a triple camera setup developed with Hasselblad, and like we said earlier, takes fantastic photos. It is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, which in 2024 is still extremely viable, and comes with 16GB of RAM and a 4,805mAh battery.

All in all, at $1,300 if you want a foldable smartphone, then this OnePlus Open deal is for you. You can check it out by clicking on this link and heading to Amazon to grab it today.
